attributes.action: Extend UK Tier 2 visa for migrants whose role became redundant due to pandemic
attributes.background: Create a scheme for Tier 2 visa holders whose role became redundant to claim 1 year of visa extension to find another Tier 2 visa sponsor. Currently, they have only 60 days to find new sponsor otherwise they are forced to leave the country and are not allowed to return on Tier 2 visa for one year.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar:
